261160.「おお 大魔王 来たか。\n 長らく ふせっておった ナラジアという若造が\n:
Oh, Demon Lord, you're here. That young
man who's been resting, Narasiaーhe's
finally awakened. Come, this way.

261161.「……あの時 感じただろう？\n ……にも わかったはずだ。:
...You felt it then, didn't you? ...know it to
be true.

261162.「ふたたび……たのは 必然。\n 僕たちだけが 神を……させられるんだ。:
Once again... is inevitable. Only we can...
the gods.

261165.「おい 若造。\n 大魔王が 来ておるぞ。\n 巫女と 何の話をしているのじゃ？:
Hey, kid. The Demon Lord is here. What
are you talking about with the Maiden?

261167.「やあ……お見舞いに来てくれたのかい？\n ありがとう うれしいな。:
Hi... you came to visit me? Thank you. I'm so
glad.

261168.「……ねえ <pc>。\n 一度 お話ししてみたかったんだ。\n キミは とても:
Hey, <pc>. I've been wanting to
talk to you for a long time. You're very
interesting...

261169.「キミの中には……\n いろんな色が うずまいているみたいだね。\n それに お:
Inside you... it's like a bunch of different
colors swirling together. And you also possess
a frightening amount of power.

261171.「よお 大魔王。ここにいたか。\n 勇者が お前に 会いにきているぜ。:
Yo, Demon Lord. There you are. The Hero
is here to see you.

261172.「アンルシアを待たせるのも 悪いから\n キリのいいところで 来てくれ。:
We don't want to keep Anlucia waiting, so come
as soon as you can.

261173.「さすが 大魔王は 忙しいみたいだね。\n 僕のことは 気にせず 行ってきなよ。:
As expected of the Demon Lord, you seem
to be busy. Don't worry about me, and go about
your business.

261174.「……ふふっ。イルーシャが キミを\n 気に入るのも わかる気がする。\n キミ:
I can see why Illusia likes you so much. I'd
very much like to talk with you again.

261175.「……あなた すっかり\n 大魔王として 慕われているのね。\n なんだか ヘン:
You're already adored as the Demon Lord,
aren't you? It feels a bit strange.

261176.「さてと…… 本題に移るわね。\n 先日の ジャゴヌバとの戦いの後で\n ルシェ:
Well... let me cut to the chase. Lushenda and
I spoke with my father about our recent battle
against Jagonuba.

261177.「魔界のことや 大魔王である あなたのこと。\n アストルティアと魔界にとっての:
About the Demon World, you becoming the Demon Lord, the crisis facing both Astoltia and the Demon World, the Age of Miasma...and
of Jagonuba, the God of Destruction.

261178.「ジャゴヌバ……まだ 目覚めきっていないのに\n おぞましく 圧倒的なチカラだっ:
Jagonuba... even though he hadn't awakened, he
was still terrifying. If he awakens, I don't
think he is something we could fight.

261179.「だから アストルティアの賢者様……\n 叡智の冠を集めて ジャゴヌバの対策を\:
That's why the sages of Astoltia... the Crown
of Wisdom are gathering to discuss a
countermeasure against Jagonuba.

261180.「そこで 大魔王サマの出番ってわけだな。\n 魔界の代表者として アストルティア:
And that's where the Demon Lord comes in. As the representative of the Demon World, you want them to participate in the talks in
Astoltia, right?

261181.「そういうこと。どうやら 賢者様たちから\n 大魔王としての あなたに 話がある:
Exactly. It seems the sages have something to
say to you in your capacity as Demon Lord.
I haven't been told what, though...

261182.「しかし……こいつは 今や 魔界の最重要人物。\n ひとりで 行かせるのは 何か:
But... they're the most important person in
the Demon World right now. I'm nervous about
letting them go alone. I'm coming, too.

261184.「勝手に 話を聞いてて ごめんなさい。\n でも 今度のこと 私と無関係に思えな:
I'm sorry for listening in without asking, but
I don't think this has anything to do with
me.

261185.「……そうね。じつは イルーシャさんにも\n ぜひ 来てもらいたいと 思っていた:
...Right. Actually, I was hoping you'd come
too, Illusia. We might need your help.

261186.「ありがとう！ アンルシアさん。\n 何か できることがあったら がんばるね。:
Thank you, Anlucia! If there is anything I can
do, then I will do my best.

261187.「この件は アスバルたちにも 伝えておく。\n 俺とお前の留守中は あいつらに\:
I'll let Asbal and the others know about this.
I'm sure they'll be fine while you and I are
away.

261188.「それじゃ グランゼドーラ城の地下にある\n 秘密会議室に 来てね。待ってるわ。:
Then come to the secret meeting room in the
basement of Gran Zedora Castle. I'll be
waiting for you.

261189.「ふむ 大魔王殿が ご到着のようだ。:
It seems that the Demon Lord has
arrived.

261191.「大魔王と戦うための使命を 授かっていた我々が\n その大魔王を 招くことになろ:
Master Broggen said, "I never thought that we,
whose mission was to fight the Demon Lord,
would be inviting them here"!

261192.「まったくじゃ！ 大魔王になってしまうとは！\n そんな ダークかつ デモニック:
I never thought ya'd become the Demon Lord!
I never told ya ta live such a dark and
demonic life!

261193.「……相変わらず 騒々しい。\n はやく ジャゴヌバ対策の話を……:
...Just as noisy as ever. Let's stop wasting
time and talk about the Jagonuba
countermeasure...

261194.「ずいぶんと 盛りあがってるようじゃないか。: You all seem to be enjoying yourselves.

261195.「だが あたし抜きで 始めようってのは\n どういう 了見だい？:
But what were you thinking, trying to start
without me?

261197.「叡智の冠 紫の座……賢者マリーン。\n 健在だとは ルシェンダから 聞いておっ:
The Purple Seat of the Crown of Wisdom... Sage
Malynn. Lushenda told us you were alive and
well.

261198.「よもや 生きているうちに\n 再び 叡智の冠が 全員そろうとはな……と\n ブ:
Master Broggen says, "I never thought I'd see
the entire Crown of Wisdom all together again
in this lifetime"!

261199.「……フン。あんたたち 見ないうちに\n ずいぶんと 老いぼれちまったねえ。\n:
...Hmph. You've all gotten old. You were still
young and spry the last time I saw you.

261200.「……師匠。あの時 ジャゴヌバを封印するために\n 神殿の奥に 残られましたね。:
...Master. Back then, you remained behind in
the temple to seal Jagonuba. Are you still in
there?

261201.「そうさ。\n 今 話題のお方の となりにいるよ。:
That's right. I'm standing right next to the
big guy right now, actually.

261202.「やっこさん まだ グーグーと\n おねんねしてるけど 寝相がひどくてねえ。\n:
The big lug is still snoozing, but his
sleeping posture is terrible. If I don't keep
my guard up, he'll blow me away in an instant.

261203.「そう……今は マリーンが\n かろうじて 封印してくれているが……:
Yes... right now, Malynn is barely able to
keep him sealed...

261204.「そこにいる 滅びの神が 目覚めた時\n この世界すべてが 滅びるだろう。\n:
When the God of Destruction awakens, the
entire world will be destroyed... not just
Astoltia, but the Demon World as well.

261205.「ゆえに 大魔王 <pc>。\n それから 魔界の者たちよ。\n 諸君たちを こ:
That is why we invited you, Demon Lord
<pc>, and the others from the
Demon World, to this place.

261206.「今度のことは 魔界が 深く関わる危機じゃ。\n アストルティア側だけでの対策は:
This is a crisis in which the Demon World is deeply involved. It would be difficult for Astoltia to deal with it alone. Cooperation
with the Demon World is a necessity.

261207.「しかーし！ 大魔王や 魔界の者どもは\n 長き間 戦ってきた 敵だったはずでア:
However! The Demon Lord and the denizens of the Demon World have been our enemies for a veeery long time. The decision to join forces
with you cannot be taken lightly!

261208.「我々 叡智の冠はつどい 話しあった。\n アストルティアは この危機に どうす:
We, the Crown of Wisdom, met and discussed
what Astoltia should do in this crisis... and
we have made a decision.

261209.「魔界と 手を結び 魔界の者たちにも\n 我々の叡智を 分けあたえてやろう……と:
Let us join hands with the Demon World and
share our wisdom with them.

261211.「これも 大魔王が そなただからこそ。\n もし そなたでなければ 我らも\n:
This is all because you are the Demon Lord.
Were it not for you, we might not have made
this decision.

261212.「……やっと 本題に入れるな。\n 大魔王。じつは お前たちが来る前に\n わし:
...Now we can finally get down to business.
Demon Lord, we were actually in the
middle of a conversation before you got here.

261213.「滅びの神に対抗しうる手段は たったひとつ。\n すなわち ジャゴヌバに匹敵する:
There is only one way to defeat the God of
Destruction: to awaken the Goddess Lutiana,
whose power rivals that of Jagonuba.

261214.「そして その復活の方法に関しても\n すでに 見当は ついておるんじゃよ。\n:
An' we've already come up with a plan ta'
bring 'er back! We're geniuses, after all!

261216.「それには はるか昔……何万年も前の\n 創世時代の神話を ひも解く必要がある…:
Master Broggen says, "To do that, you need to
go back tens of thousands of years, to the
myths of creation"!

261217.「世界が創られた 神々の時代ともなると\n 我らの叡智をもってしても 判然としな:
When it comes to the age of the gods, when the world was created... even with our knowledge, we are uncertain. But we do know there are
clues we can follow.

261218.「伝承によれば 女神の使徒の末裔が住み\n 神話の時代から 続くという\n 光の:
According to legend, there is a place called Finetka, the Town of Light, where the descendants of the Goddess' apostles have
lived since ancient times.

261219.「そこなら 創世時代の神話や 女神の復活方法が\n パーフェクトかつ イグザクト:
There, you can perfectly and exactly
understand the legends of the world's creation
and learn how to resurrect the Goddess!

261220.「……光の郷フィネトカ。\n アストルティアに そんな場所があるなんて\n はじ:
Finetka, the Town of Light... I had never
heard of such a place in Astoltia.

261221.「ぜひ 私に 行かせてください！\n 勇者の誇りにかけて ルティアナ様の\n 復:
Please let me go! I will stake my pride as a
Hero to find a way to revive Lutiana!

261222.「私も そこに 同行させてもらえませんか？\n うまく 言えないのだけれど\n:
I was wondering if I could accompany you
there. I don't know how to say this, but
something's been bothering me...

261223.「それは 難しいな。魔界から来た娘よ。\n この旅には 危険が伴う。\n そなた:
That would be difficult, girl from the Demon
World. The journey will be dangerous if you
go...

261224.「行かせてやりな。\n ……その子には 不思議なチカラがあるんだ。\n 案外 今:
Let her go. That girl has a mysterious power.
She may be the most important person in all of
this.

261225.「……マリーンが そう言うなら\n 何かが あるのだろう。好きにするがいい。:
...If Malynn says so, there must be something
to it. Suit yourself, then.

261226.「イルーシャが 行くと言うなら\n 俺たちが 護衛してやらないとな。:
If Illusia insists on going, we'll have to
escort her.

261227.「どうやら 話は まとまったようだな。\n 多くの困難を乗り越えてきた そなたた:
It seems we've come to an agreement. You have overcome many hardships, and you are perfectly suited to play a major role in the
resurrection of the goddess.

261228.「フィネトカについては 私から伝えよう。\n すまないが この後 私の部屋に来て:
I will tell you about Finetka. I'm sorry, but
you'll have to come to my office later.

261229.「さて……なすべきことは 決まった。\n これにて 解散とする！:
Now... what needs to be done has been decided.
This meeting is adjourned!

261230.「もう お開きかい？ ……やれやれ せっかく\n 魔界の果てから 参加したのに:
Are you done with the party already? I called all the way from the end of the Demon World to join this event, but it's so boring. Well,
it's still good to see some old, familiar faces.

261231.「ただ……時間は そう残されちゃいないよ。\n 滅びの神の封印は 長くは 保たな:
Only... time is not on our side. The seal on
the God of Destruction will not hold for long.
I'm counting on you.

261232.<pc>は 賢者の執務室へ向かった……。\nルシェンダに 話しかけよう。:
<pc> headed to the Sage's office.
Talk to Lushenda.

261234.「ああ イルーシャ！\n やっぱり ここにいたんだね。: Oh, Illusia! I knew you were here.

261236.「そうよ。\n どうやって この場所まで来たの？: Yeah. How did you find this place?

261238.「ただ イルーシャを探していたら\n いつの間にか ここに 来ていたんだ。:
I was just looking for Illusia and before I
knew it, I was here.

261240.「どうやら 道が拓けたようね。: Looks like the way forward's opened up.

261242.「まったく つかみどころがないヤツだな。: Geez, what a dodgy guy he is.

261243.「女神の導きを たどれば 神話時代から残る\n 光の郷フィネトカとやらに 着くは:
If we follow the Goddess' guidance, we should
end up at this mythical Town of Light.
Let's get going.

261246.「うん。はじめて 来た気がしないね。:
Yeah. It doesn't feel like it's my first time
here.

261247.「ふぁっふぁっふぁ。ようやく 来たか。\n 待ちかねたぞ 若いの。:
Ho-ho-ho. You've finally arrived. I've been
waiting for you, youngsters.

261249.「わしは…… 極天女帝。\n ルティアナ様の使徒 六聖陣のひとり。\n この郷の:
I am... the Sky Empress. I am one of the Six
Saints, the apostles of Lutiana. I am also the
elder of this village.

261250.「こんなチビが…… 長老だと？\n どういうことだ？:
This runt... the elder? Is this some kind of
joke?

261251.「これ 魔族の若造。礼儀が なっとらんの。\n クチを つつしむがよい。:
You there, young demon. You've got no manners.
Show a little respect!

261252.「さてと……\n お前たちの目的は わかっておるぞえ。:
Now, then... I already know why you're all
here.

261253.「忌まわしきもの……大いなる闇の根源が\n 目覚めそうなんじゃろ？:
That abomination... the Great Source of
Darkness is about to awaken, isn't it?

261254.「わしら六聖陣も 当然 把握しておる。\n くわしくは あの聖堂で 話そうじゃな:
Of course, we, the Six Saints, are aware of
it. Let's talk about it in that Shrine. We
will be waiting.

261255.「あんな少女が 六聖陣だなんて\n 不思議なことが あるものね。\n ……とにか:
It's strange that such a girl is a member of
the Six Saints... Anyway, let's go talk to
her.

261256.「あれっ ナラジア……どこ？: Huh, Narasia...? Where did he go?

261257.「気配は 感じるのに ヘンね……。: I can still sense him. How strange...

261258.「さーて お前たちが\n ここに来た理由。それは……: Now, the reason you're here. That's...

261260.「おお～ そうじゃった。\n 光の女神 ルティアナ様の復活！\n その方法を 探:
Ohhh, right. The resurrection of Lutiana,
the Goddess of Light! You came looking for a
way to do that, didn't you?

261261.「わしら 六聖陣の使命は\n 古の伝説を継承し 闘戦士を育て 来たるべき\n 大:
Our mission as the Six Saints is to carry on the ancient legends and raise warriors to prepare for the second coming of the Great
Source of Darkness.

261262.「そして ここに アストルティアに散らばる\n 女神ルティアナ様の使徒 六聖陣が:
And here, the Six Saintsーmessengers of
Lutiana scattered throughout Astoltiaー
have gathered. The time has finally come.

261263.「では 突然じゃが そこな娘。\n その場所で 祈るがよい。:
This is a bit sudden, but you there, girl.
Pray in that spot over there.

261265.「だけど 祈るって どうすれば……: But, I don't know how to pray...

261266.「心配するでない。\n 清らかな 心のままに\n そこに 立てば…… わかるはず:
Don't worry. If you stand there with a pure
heart... it will come to you.

261267.「これより 我ら六聖陣に 受け継がれし\n 神々の物語を 語りましょう。:
From here, let us Six Saints tell you the
story of the gods that has been handed down to
us.

261268.「はるか はるか いにしえの物語。\n これなるは 大地が生まれし時の記憶。:
A story from long, long ago. This is the
memory of the world's birth.

261269.「かの遠き世界……とこしえのゆりかごは\n 終わりの時を 迎えんとしていた。:
In a distant world... the Eternal Cradle was
soon facing its end.

261270.「老いし世界の 古き神は\n 一柱の若き神に 創生のチカラを託した。\n これを:
The ancient god of that world entrusted the
power of creation to a younger goddess. With
this, She became a Goddess of Creation.

261272.「ルティアナは とこしえのゆりかごを出立する。\n 久遠に続く 苦難に満ちた 旅:
Lutiana departed from the Eternal Cradle. At
the end of a long and arduous journey, in a
place of rest, She created this world.

261273.「新たなる世界に 降りたった ルティアナは\n まず光から 七柱の神々を 創られ:
Lutiana descended upon the new world, and from
the light, created seven gods.

261274.「新たに生まれし 七柱の神々は\n それぞれの似姿となる 七つの種族と\n それ:
The seven newborn gods created seven races,
each in their own image, and the lands in
which they inhabited.

261275.「そうして 生まれた世界……アストルティアには\n 光と緑が満ち 命の歌が 響き:
The newborn world of Astoltia was full of
light and greenery, and the song of life rang
out. It seemed this peace would last forever.

261276.「ところが……それが 現れた。\n 夜の闇よりも昏い 昏い闇の底から。:
But then... it appeared. From the depths of
darkness, darker than the darkness of night.

261277.「それは 生きとし生けるものを\n 滅ぼさんとする 悪しき神。:
An evil god that seeks to destroy all living
things...

261278.「その神の名は……異界滅神 ジャゴヌバ。:
The name of that god was... Jagonuba, the
Otherworldly Obliterator.

261279.「かくして 神々の 永き戦いがはじまった。: And so began the eternal battle of the gods.

261280.「はるか はるか いにしえの物語。\n これなるは 神々の戦いの記憶。:
A story from a long, long time ago. This is
the memory of the battle of the gods.

261285.「その装置は 神話の時代より受け継がれし遺物。\n 先ほど 幾万年の眠りから 目:
That device is a relic handed down from
ancient times. It has awakened for the first
time in tens of thousands of years.

261287.「のう 娘や。その装置を 呼び起こせる者は\n 女神の依代と 言われておる。:
Listen, young lady. It is said that the one
who can rouse the device is the divine vessel
of the Goddess.

261288.「イルーシャ様…… そなたのことじゃ。: Lady Illusia... I'm talking about you.

261290.「よくぞ 戻られましたな。\n イルーシャ様。: You've finally returned to us, Lady Illusia.

261292.「ふむ……\n すぐに 信じられぬのも 無理はない。:
Hmmm... no wonder you don't believe me right
away.

261294.「炎に覆われた 灼熱の山。\n カルサドラ火山……？:
A burning mountain covered in flames.
Calsadora Volcano...?

261295.「その腕輪は 光の神装と呼ばれる\n 女神様にゆかりがある ５つの装備のひとつ。:
That bangle is one of five pieces of equipment
associated with the Goddess, called the
Goddess' Garments of Light.

261296.「伝承によれば 女神の依代たる イルーシャ様が\n 光の神装を身にまとい ある儀:
According to legend, Lutiana will be resurrected by performing a certain ritual in which Lady Illusia will be dressed as the
Goddess of Light.

261297.「残り４つの光の神装は 神々の時代に建造され\n アストルティアの各地に 隠され:
The remaining four Garments of Light are kept in the shrines of the Goddess that were built in the age of gods, and are hidden throughout
Astoltia.

261298.「先程 おっしゃった 灼熱の山こそ\n さらなる 光の神装が眠る 女神の祠。\n:
The burning mountain you mentioned earlier is
the location of one such shrine. Fate is
guiding you, Lady Illusia.

261299.「……イルーシャ様 いかがじゃろうか？\n わしら 六聖陣にとって 女神様の復活:
...How do you feel about this, Lady Illusia? For we Six Saints, the return of the Goddess has been a long-cherished dream. She is the
only one who can stand against Jagonuba.

261300.「ルティアナ様の復活のため……\n 女神の祠を 巡礼してくれんかのう？:
For the sake of the resurrection of Lutiana,
will you make a pilgrimage to the shrines?

261301.「私が…… 女神の依代だなんて……\n まだ とても 信じられない。:
I still can't believe that I am... a vessel of
the Goddess.

261302.「だけど…… 思い当たることもある。\n 私の魔瘴をあやつるチカラや 奇妙な記憶:
But... it makes sense now. My ability to
control demon miasma, my strange memories...

261303.「女神ルティアナの復活……\n それが 私にしかできないことなら\n 私は 逃げ:
The resurrection of the Goddess Lutiana... if
that is something only I can do, I don't want
to run away from it.

261304.「やはり お前は ただ者じゃなかったんだな。\n ……イルーシャが そうすると決:
I knew you were something special. If that's
what Illusia's decided to do, then I'll help
her.

261305.「もちろん 私も 手伝うわ！\n イルーシャさんが 神話の登場人物だなんて\n:
Of course I'll help, too! I still can't
believe that Illusia is some mythological
figure, but...

261306.「おっと 待ちたまえ～！\n 残念ながら きみたちを イルーシャ様の巡礼に\n:
Not so fast, there～! I'm afraid we can't let
you go with Lady Illusia on her pilgrimage.

261307.「この中で イルーシャ様と\n 同行することを ゆるされるのは……\n <pc>:
The only one here who will be allowed to
accompany Lady Illusia... is you,
<pc>.

261308.「なぜだ？ 俺が 魔族だから……って\n わけじゃなさそうだな。:
Why? I'm guessing... it's not because I'm a
demon, is it?

261309.「<pc>。きみは かつて\n 竜の神ナドラガと 戦っただろう。その時に\n 種:
<pc>. You once fought Nadraga, the
dragon god. At that time, you were given the
power of the other gods, weren't you?

261310.「闇の根源が眠りし地で イルーシャ様が\n 目覚めたのは どうやら きみの中の\:
It seems that Lady Illusia's awakening in the land where the Great Source of Darkness sleeps was in response to the power of the gods that
dwells within you.

261311.「そうなんだ……。\n 私が 闇の中で感じた あたたかな光は\n あなたの中の:
I see... the warm light I felt in the darkness
was the power of gods inside you.

261312.「そして……\n じつは 光の神装は その重要さゆえ\n 祠の番人に守られている:
Another thing... the Goddess' Garments of
Light are protected by shrine guardians due to
their importance.

261313.「イルーシャ様は 女神の依代たるチカラを\n 番人どもに 示さねばならない。\n:
Lady Illusia must demonstrate her power as the
Goddess' vessel to the guardians. It is a
trial that shall be imposed upon her.

261314.「だが その神々のチカラをもって\n 女神の依代と通じあった 君であれば\n 試:
But you, who have communed with the Goddess'
vessel through the power of the gods, will be
allowed to assist her in these trials.

261315.「言うなれば ふたりは\n 母子のようなものなのだから。:
You could say that the two of you are like
mother and child.

261316.「あなたに ついて来てもらえるなら うれしい。\n 一緒に 来てくれる？<yes:
I would love it if you came with me. Will you?
<yesno><close>

261317.「でも…… 危険が待っているかもしれないし\n イルーシャさんだけじゃ 心配だわ:
But... there could be danger ahead, and I'm
worried about Illusia going alone. Will you go
with her? <yesno><close>

261318.「ありがとう！\n 私…… がんばってみるね！: Thank you! I'll... try my best!

261319.「しかし せっかく ここまで来たのに\n 俺たちは お留守番ってワケか。:
But we came all the way here, and now we're
being left behind.

261320.「そうとも 限らないよ。\n キミたちには キミたちで\n 果たすべき ミッショ:
Not necessarily. You have your own mission to
fulfill.

261321.「ジャゴヌバの眷属である 邪神と戦ったろう？\n じつは 邪神を倒せたのは 神の:
You fought a Dark Deity, one of Jagonuba's offspring, didn't you? The truth is, it was only possible due to the divine power of both
and Illusia.

261322.「それでは…… 私たちだけでは\n 邪神を 倒せないということなんですか？:
So... does that mean we can't defeat the Dark
Deities on our own?

261323.「案ずるでない。わたくしども 六聖陣が\n 邪神に対抗しうる 神殺しの秘技を授け:
Don't worry. We, the Six Saints, will teach you the secret skill of godslaying that will allow you to resist the Dark Deities. You
possess the qualities befitting for such training.

261324.「だが 容易に 身につけられると思うな。\n この修行は 極めて 厳しいものにな:
But don't think this will be a walk in the
park. This training is going to be extremely
severe.

261326.「邪神に対抗するチカラ……そんな重要なものを\n 魔王だけに 習得させるわけには:
The power to resist the Dark Deities... I can't let a Demon King be the only one to learn such an important thing. I accept this
training as a Hero!

261327.「さて 話が 横にそれたが\n まずは イルーシャ様が見た光景の示す地……\n:
We've digressed a little, but first, we must
go to the shrine of the goddess of Calsadora
Volcano, the site of Lady Illusia's vision.

261328.「彼らの修行は 他の六聖陣に 任せるとして\n わしは 祠の巡礼に 同行するとし:
I will leave the training to the other Saints,
and accompany you on your pilgrimage to the
shrines.

261329.<center>そのチカラ 女神の依代と 見受けたり。\n汝に 女神の記憶と 光:
Thou hath shown thine power as a vessel of the
Goddess. I bestow upon thee the memories of
the Goddess, and Her Garment of Light.

261330.<center>されば 女神の御心をもって 祈りを捧げよ。:
Now, with the will of the Goddess, offer up a
prayer.

261331.「ほー。最初の試練を 果たしたようじゃな。\n おつかれさん。:
Oh, you've completed your first trial. Well
done.

261332.「さて……フィネトカで語った 神話じゃが\n じつは その続きが 各地の女神の祠:
Now then... about the story we told you in
Finetka. It's said that the rest of the tale
lies in the Goddess Shrines across the land.

261333.「今 映し出されているのが その神話じゃ。\n それを 読み解くために わしが\:
What you are seeing now is another part of
that myth. The reason I came along with you
was to decipher it.

261334.「さて……この祠に刻まれた 神代の記憶はと。:
Now... to read the divine memories inscribed
in this shrine...

261335.「はるか はるか いにしえの物語。\n これなるは 七柱の邪神の記憶。:
A story from a long, long time ago. This is
the memory of the seven Dark Deities.

261336.「滅びの神が この世界に 現れた時\n 女神ルティアナは 滅びの神に汚された大地:
When the God of Destruction appeared in this
world, Lutiana cut off the earth, which had
been defiled, from the world of life.

261337.「そこで 滅びの神は その身体より\n 七柱の邪神を生みだし 生命ある世界に\n:
The God of Destruction then birthed from His
body seven Dark Deities, and sent them to the
world of life to destroy it.

261338.「七柱の名は 戦禍の邪神 虚無の邪神\n 暴虐の邪神 禁忌の邪神 嘲弄の邪神\n:
These seven were the Dark Deities of War,
Nihility, Tyranny, Forbiddance, Scorn,
Resentment, and Desire.

261339.「攻め入ってきた邪神どもに 立ち向かい\n 戦ったのは 種族神たちだった。\n:
It was the gods of the seven races who fought
against the invading Dark Deities. The battle
raged on, and the land was devastated.

261340.「そこで 母なる女神は\n 神気を込めた かがやく矢を放ち\n 邪神どもを 次々:
Then, the Mother Goddess shot a volley of
arrows, filled with Her divine energy, and
shot down the Dark Deities one after another.

261341.「邪神が倒れた地は けがれを残したが\n 女神は それ以上 広がらぬよう\n そ:
The land where the Dark Deities fell left
behind wounds, but the Goddess sealed them so
that those wounds would not spread.

261343.「その通り…… ここ 女神の祠じゃな。\n あれに見えるが 封印の証じゃろうて。:
That's right... this very shrine. It may look
like a shrine, but it also acts as a seal.

261344.「これが……光の神装のひとつ。: That's... one of the Garments of Light.

261345.「……次の 女神の祠の場所が見えたわ。\n 魔瘴に 侵されし谷……\n けがれの:
I see the location of the next shrine. It
looks like it's in a place called Defiled
Valley... a valley infested by miasma.

261346.「……ほほう。\n やはり 光の神装と 呼応しているようじゃな。\n それじゃ:
...I see. As I thought, it seems to be in
response to the Garments of Light. Well then,
let's move on to the next shrine.

261347.<center>そのチカラ 女神の依代と 見受けたり。\n汝に 女神の記憶と 光:
Thou hath shown thine power as a vessel of the
Goddess. I bestow upon thee the memories of
the Goddess, and Her Garment of Light.

261348.<center>されば 女神の御心をもって 祈りを捧げよ。:
Now, with the will of the Goddess, offer up a
prayer.

261349.「……ふたつ目の試練 おつかれさん。\n だいぶ こなれてきたんじゃないかねえ？:
...Good work on the second trial. It looks
like you're getting the hang of it.

261350.「さて この祠には どんな神話が\n 残っているんだろうねえ？: I wonder what myths were left in this shrine?

261351.「はるか はるか いにしえの物語。\n これなるは 神々の戦いの記憶。:
A story from a long, long time ago. This is
the memory of the battle of the gods.

261352.「七柱の邪神どもが 倒されると\n 滅びの神が みずから 生命の大地に襲来し\n:
When the seven Dark Deities were defeated, the God of Destruction Himself attacked the land of life, and finally the battle between the
two great gods began.

261353.「ある山は火を噴き ある海は涸れはてた。\n 二柱の神の戦いは 拮抗し\n 幾千:
A mountain spewed fire, and a sea ran dry. The
war between the two gods raged for thousands
of years.

261354.「このまま 戦いが続くことに\n 世界の崩壊を予感した 女神ルティアナは\n い:
Sensing the collapse of the world if the
fighting continued, the Goddess Lutiana
finally decided to use Her last resort.

261355.「……そういえば あの穴。\n 前の祠には なかったわ。:
...By the way, that hole... I didn't see a
hole like that in the previous shrine.

261356.「……邪神が 封印を抜けでた跡じゃな。\n ５００年前の天変地異に乗じ 破ったよ:
...It seems that the Dark Deity took advantage of a natural disaster 500 years ago to break through the seal, but to this day, no Dark
Deity has ever been found.

261357.「あれは 酸鼻を極めた時代でのう。顔なじみも\n たくさん 死んだ。……はて く:
It was a turbulent time. Many familiar faces
perished... I wonder if that accursed fiend
was also scorched to death by that false sun?

261358.「……極天女帝さん。まるで\n 当時を知っているような 言い方……？:
...Sky Empress. You speak as if you are
familiar with these things...?

261359.「……いかにも。\n わしには 神話時代からの記憶がある。:
...Indeed. I've inherited memories from the
ancient times.

261360.「わしら 六聖陣は 神話の時代に始まり\n 代々の後継者に 使命を引き継ぐことで:
We, the Six Saints, began in the age of the gods, and have persisted to this day by passing on our mission to our successors
across generations.

261361.「じゃが 極天女帝の位だけは 特殊でのう。\n 使命だけでなく その記憶も 継承:
But the position of Sky Empress is unique. Not only their mission, but their memories are passed on to the next generation. Therefore,
it is as if I had experienced the past myself.

261362.「かつて そなたとも会ったことがあるんじゃぞ。\n ……そなたの 分身ともな。:
I have met you before... as well as your other
self.

261364.「おお イルーシャ様 大丈夫かえ？: Oh, Lady Illusia, are you all right?

261365.「……うん 心配いらないわ。\n すこし 頭が くらくらしただけ。:
...Don't worry. I'm just feeling a little
lightheaded.

261366.「巡礼で 疲れが たまっているのやもしれん。\n ムリをするでないぞ。:
You may be tired from your pilgrimage. Don't
push yourself too hard.

261367.「次は 水中に 遺跡が沈む……\n シエラ巡礼地という 場所みたい。\n そこに:
Next, we're going to a place called Sierra
Shrinelands, where ruins are sunk
underwater. Let's head there.

261369.「あは あはは～？\n おかしいなあ この辺りで……:
Aha, ahaha～? That's funny. I thought it was
around here...

261371.「キミは 盟友くん！\n どうして こんなところに！？: It's the ally! What are YOU doing here!?

261372.「え？ なになに～？\n なんで 倒したはずなのに\n まだ生きているのか……だ:
Huh? What is it, what is it? How am I still
alive even though you beat me before～?

261373.「あははは！ ヤダなあ！\n このボクが あれしきで 死ぬわけないでしょ！\n:
Ahahaha! Come on! There's no way I'd die from
something like that! You're hilarious!!

261375.「こちらに いらしていたんですね。\n ボクたちから お迎えにあがろうと思ってた:
I didn't know you were here. I was going to
come pick you up, but I didn't expect you to
be here in person...

261377.「ははあ……なるほど そういうことでしたか！: Ahh... I see, so that's how it is!

261378.「近くに いらっしゃったようだから\n ごあいさつしなくちゃと 思ったけど……\:
I saw you were in the neighborhood, so I
thought I'd say hello... but it looks like
you're in the middle of something! Sorry～!

261379.「あはは！ いよいよですね！\n また お会いしましょう！: Ahaha! It's about that time! See you soon!

261380.「曲者めっ！ 逃さん！: You ruffian! You won't get away!

261381.「むう…… どうも 手応えが薄かったのう。\n これで 倒せたとも 思えん。:
Hmm... that was a weak response. I don't think
that was enough to deal with him.

261382.「しかし イルーシャ様に\n ブツブツと ワケのわからぬことを話して……\n な:
But what was all that nonsense he was
muttering to Lady Illusia? It was really
creepy.

261383.「考えても 仕方がなさそうじゃな。\n 次の祠へと 向かうとしようぞ。:
I guess there's no point in worrying about it.
Let's move on to the next shrine.

261384.<center>そのチカラ 女神の依代と 見受けたり。\n汝に 女神の記憶と 光:
Thou hath shown thine power as a vessel of the
Goddess. I bestow upon thee the memories of
the Goddess, and Her Garment of Light.

261385.<center>されば 女神の御心をもって 祈りを捧げよ。:
Now, with the will of the Goddess, offer up a
prayer.

261386.「３つ目の試練 おつかれさん。\n いよいよ 巡礼も終わりが 近いねえ。\n さ:
Good job on the third trial. Finally, the end
of the pilgrimage is near. Now, the myth in
this place...

261387.「はるか はるか いにしえの物語。\n これなるは 女神の秘法の記憶。:
A story from a long, long time ago. This is
the memory of the Goddess' secret.

261388.「女神ルティアナは 鏡合わせの秘儀によって\n 滅びの神を 封印せんとした。:
The Goddess Lutiana sought to seal the God of
Destruction with the secret art of the Mirror
Match.

261389.「この秘儀をもって 二柱の神は\n それぞれに 身体と魂が 分かたれたという。:
Through this secret technique, the two deities
were divided into two bodies and two souls.

261390.「滅びの神の身体は けがれし大地の 魔の山に。:
The God of Destruction's body rests in Demon
Mountain, in the defiled land.

261391.「女神の身体は 光の河となって\n けがれし大地との間をへだて\n 生命の大地を:
The Goddess' body became a river of light,
protecting the land of life by separating it
from the defiled land.

261392.「残された 女神と滅びの神の 魂は……:
The remaining souls of the Goddess and the
God of Destruction were...

261393.「そう……じゃったのか。\n こんな方法で 封じておったとは 知らなんだ。:
That's... what it was? I had no idea She had
used such a technique to seal Him.

261401.「……イルーシャ様は ひどく弱っておられる。\n 残るひとつの 祠への巡礼は 中:
Lady Illusia is very weak. Let us postpone the
pilgrimage to the final shrine. I will take
her back to Finetka to rest.

261402.「それに……お前さんと お前さんの仲間にも\n 話さなくちゃならないことが でき:
Besides, I have something to tell you and your
companions. I'll be waiting for you at the inn
in Finetka.

261403.「大丈夫よ。\n イルーシャさんなら ぐっすり 眠っているわ。: It's okay. Illusia is sleeping soundly.

261404.「光の河が じつは ルティアナの身体で\n 魔界から アストルティアを守ってる…:
I heard that the River of Light is actually
Lutiana's body protecting Astoltia from the
Demon World.

261405.「さあ 極天女帝。\n 話の続きが あるんだろ？\n そろそろ 教えてくれてもい:
Come on, Sky Empress. There's more to this
story, isn't there? Isn't it about time you
told us?

261406.「女神様を 復活させるには\n イルーシャ様が 光の神装を身にまとい\n 儀式を:
I told you once that in order to resurrect the
Goddess, Illusia must perform a ritual wearing
the Garments of Light.

261407.「女神の祠を巡ったことで\n その儀式の詳細が 明らかになったのじゃ。:
The pilgrimage to the Goddess' shrines
revealed the details of the ritual.

261408.「その儀式……神魂融合の儀は\n 女神様の魂と 女神様の身体を\n 再び結びつけ:
The purpose of the ritual... is to reunite the
soul of the Goddess with Her body.

261409.「そして……女神様の身体が 光の河ならば\n その魂は 女神の依代……イルーシャ:
And... if the Goddess' body is the River of
Light, then Her soul is sealed within the
Goddess' vessel... inside Lady Illusia.

261410.「極天女帝様。その儀式をしたら\n イルーシャさんは どうなってしまうんですか？:
Sky Empress. What will happen to Illusia when
she performs that ritual?

261412.「さよう。ルティアナ様が 復活する時……\n イルーシャ様は 光の河に溶けて 一:
Yes. When Lutiana is resurrected, Illusia will
melt into the River of Light, and become one
with Her.

261413.「イルーシャ様は 消えてしまうんじゃ。: Lady Illusia will cease to exist.

261414.「……すまぬ。神代の記憶があるとはいえ\n わしも ルティアナ様が どのような\:
...I'm sorry. Even though I had memories from
the age of gods, I had no idea what kind of
seal Lutiana had used.

261415.「そんな……そんな バカなことがあるかよ！？\n ルティアナを復活させるには\n:
That's... that's ridiculous! Why does Illusia
have to be sacrificed in order to revive
Lutiana!?

261416.「何か……何か他に 方法はないのかよ！？: Is there... isn't there any other way!?

261418.「そんなの あんまりだわ。\n イルーシャさんが これを知ったら……:
I can't believe it. If Ms. Illusia finds out
about this...

261420.「女神の祠は もうひとつ 残ってるわ。\n 巡礼の試練を 続けて\n ルティアナ:
One more shrine remains. Let us continue the
trials of the pilgrimage to bring Lutiana back
to life.

261422.「じつはね。祠を 巡礼していくうちに\n 自分の中に 誰か……とても大きな何者か:
Actually, during the pilgrimage, I could feel
that someone... something big... was sleeping
inside of me.

261423.「それで……私が 消えるべき存在なんだって\n なんとなく 気づいていたの。:
So... I kind of realized that I would have to
disappear.

261424.「私……自分が 何者なのか\n ずっと 悩んでた。知りたかった。:
I... always wondered who I was. I wanted to
know.

261425.「そして 今日……\n 生まれてきた意味が やっと わかった。:
And today... I finally understand the meaning
of my birth.

261426.「自分が消えることで 世界を救えるなら\n 私は この運命を 受けいれるわ。:
If I can save the world by disappearing, I
will accept my fate.

261427.「……少し 風に当たりたいから\n 外に 出ているね。: ...I'm going out for a bit of fresh air.

261428.「自分が消えることが 生まれた意味だと？\n そんな運命 あってたまるか……！:
Being born just to die? That's not a fate I
can accept...!

261429.「ねえ……<pc>。\n やっぱり イルーシャさんのこと 心配だわ。:
Hey... <pc>. I'm worried about
Ms. Illusia.

261430.「ああして 気丈に 振る舞っていたけれど\n 本当は 不安で たまらないはずよ。:
I'm sure she's really anxious about it, even
though she's been acting strong.

261431.「私も 彼女のために 何かしてあげたいけれど\n きっと あなたじゃないと ダメ:
I wish I could do something for her, but I
think it should be you. Why don't you go check
on Ms. Illusia?

261432.<center>そのチカラ 女神の依代と 見受けたり。\n汝に 女神の記憶と 光:
Thou hath shown thine power as a vessel of the
Goddess. I bestow upon thee the memories of
the Goddess, and Her Garment of Light.

261433.<center>されば 女神の御心をもって 祈りを捧げよ。:
Now, with the will of the Goddess, offer up a
prayer.

261434.「……最後の試練が 終わったようじゃな。: ...Looks like the final trial is over.

261435.「神話を語るのも 最後になるのかねえ。\n どれどれ……:
This is probably the final part of the myth.
Let's see...

261436.「はるか はるか いにしえの物語。\n これなるは 眠れる神の記憶。:
A story from a long, long time ago. This is
the memory of the sleeping gods.

261437.「依代に 封じられし 神の魂は\n その身体と相反する地に 封印されり。\n そ:
The souls of the gods, sealed within vessels,
were sealed in places at odds with their
bodies, to prevent their reawakening.

261438.「女神の魂は\n 滅びの神の身体が眠りし 山の頂に。:
The soul of the Goddess rests on the summit
alongside the God of Destruction's body.

261439.「滅びの神の魂は\n 女神の身体なりし 光の河の中に。:
The soul of the God of Destruction rests in
the Goddess' body, the River of Light.

261440.「これなるは 神々の物語……。\n 眠れる神々を 目覚めさせぬよう\n その記憶:
This is the story of the gods... Let us share their memories and seal them in shrines throughout the land, so that the sleeping gods
will never awaken.

261441.「滅びの神の魂って……。: The soul of the God of Destruction...

261444.「光の神装が すべて集まったゆえ\n イルーシャ様と 呼応したんじゃな……。:
The Garments of Light are gathering in
response to Lady Illusia...

261446.「イルーシャ様 もしや……\n いにしえの記憶が 戻られたのか？:
Lady Illusia, if I may ask... have your
ancient memories returned to you?

261447.「ばあや なのね！\n ああ また 会えてうれしい！:
It's grandmother! Oh, it's so good to see you
again!

261448.「ああ イルーシャ様。\n わしは……どれだけの 永き間\n この瞬間を 待って:
Oh, Lady Illusia. How long I have waited for
this moment...

261449.「じゃが……じゃが なんと言えば……。\n わしらは イルーシャ様ひとりに\n:
But... but what can I say... I wish that we
did not have to burden you with such an
onerous task, Lady Illusia...

261450.「ううん。気にしていないわ。\n これが 私の 運命なんだから。: No, it's all right. This is my destiny.

261451.「それに ぜんぶ 思いだしたの。\n これから やるべきことが わかったわ。\n:
And I remembered everything. I know what I
have to do now... what Narasia said.

261452.「誰かが 来る……行かなくちゃ！: Someone's coming... we have to go!

261453.「……イルーシャ様は\n いったい どうされたんじゃろうか？\n 急いで 追おう:
...What in the world is going on with Lady
Illusia? Let's hurry and find out.

261454.「あはは あはは！\n みーつけた！ みーつけた！: Ahaha, ahaha! Found you! Found you!

261456.「へっへん。ボク 知ってるよ～。\n そこの娘…… これから\n 女神を 復活さ:
Heh, heh. I know who she is. That girl over
there... she's going to bring back the
Goddess, isn't she?

261457.「そんなことは ボクが させないよ～だ！\n そ～れッ！: But I won't let you do that～! Take this～!

261460.「死んじゃった？ 死んじゃった？\n あはは！ あはははは！: Is she dead? Is she dead? Ahaha! Ahahahaha!

261464.<center>依代を守るため 一時的に めざめたようだ。\nだが 長くは 保つ:
I have awakened temporarily to protect the
vessel. But it will not last long...

261466.「さっすがぁ～！\n これが 女神ルティアナのチカラか～！:
That's what I'm talking about～! This is the
power of the Goddess Lutiana～!

261468.「はあ。でも……ボク 笑いつかれちゃった。\n もう お遊びは やめにしません？:
Ha... but now I'm tired of laughing. Can we
stop playing games, now? I know you're in
there.

261471.「……ふう。影の中は 窮屈だった。: ...Phew. It was cramped in the shadows.

261472.「ピュージュ ご苦労だったね。\n 僕が眠っている間……\n ずっと 僕のために:
Sorry for the trouble, Pyuju. You've been
working hard for me while I was sleeping,
weren't you...?

261473.「あはは。とんでもございません。\n ただ ボクたちは 魔界の扉を開いただけ。\:
Ahaha. Not at all. I merely opened the door to
the Demon World. Everything else was up to
fate, and fate is on Lord Jagonuba's side.

261474.「……やあ 久しぶりだね ばあや。\n 僕が 滅びの神の依代となって 以来かな。:
...Long time no see, grandmother. It's been a
while since I became the vessel for the God of
Destruction.

261475.「ナラジア様 なぜ ここに……。\n それに その呼ばれ方は……！？:
Master Narasia, why are you here...? And why
are you calling me that...!?

261476.「……そうさ。僕の中には ジャゴヌバがいる。\n この前 ジャゴヌバ神殿で 思い:
...That's right. Jagonuba is inside me. And
inside the Temple of Jagonuba, I remembered.
That huge body is my real body.

261477.「そうしたら 急に モヤモヤが晴れて\n 僕のやりたいことが はっきりしたんだ。:
Suddenly, the fog cleared, and I knew exactly
what I wanted to do...

261478.「……あの分かたれた身体と ひとつになって\n この世界を 滅ぼしたい。\n そ:
...I want to become one with my divided body
and destroy this world. That is the purpose of
my birth.

261479.「な なんてことじゃ……。\n ナラジア様が……\n 完全に ジャゴヌバに飲まれ:
Oh, no... Master Narasia... has been
completely consumed by Jagonuba...

261480.「<cs_pchero> 助かったよ。\n じつは イルーシャの影の中に潜んで\:
Thank you for your help, <cs_pchero>. I
was actually hiding in Illusia's shadow,
tagging along with you.

261481.「なぜって？ ふふふ……。\n 祠には 邪神たちが 眠っているだろう？:
Why, you ask? Hmhmhm... the Dark Deities are
sleeping inside the shrines, aren't they?

261482.「主人である僕が 訪れれば\n 彼らは その気配だけで 目覚める。:
If I, their master, visit them, they will
awaken at the mere sign of my presence.

261484.「あは！ あはははは！\n 楽しいことに なってきたぞ～！: Aha! Ahahahaha! This is getting fun～!

261485.「……ワレは 禁忌の邪神ヤファギル。: ...I am Yaphagil, Dark Deity of Forbiddance.

261486.「ワレを よみがえらせていただき\n 感謝いたします。: Thank you for restoring me to life.

261487.「ふふふ。ジャゴヌバの 完全なる復活には\n キミのチカラが 必要だ。\n 僕た:
Hmhmhm. Jagonuba needs your help to be fully
revived. Come with us.

261489.「……なぜです ルティアナ様。\n なぜ だまって 見ておられるのです……？:
Why, Lutiana? Why are you just standing there
and watching...?

261492.<center>……承知。\nいざ ルファ神殿へ。: ...I know. Let us go to Rufa Temple.

261493.「ふがっ……！？\n ルティアナ様 な…なぜですじゃ！\n なぜ 滅びの神と 共:
Wha...! Lutiana, why!? Why are you leaving
with the God of Destruction!?

261494.<center>アストルティアの子らよ。\n心配は 無用。: Children of Astoltia. Do not worry.

261495.<center>かくなりしは 必然の定め。\n我に 任せるがよい。:
It was inevitable that this would happen.
Leave it to me.

261497.「これは 大変なことになった。\n ルティアナ様が…… イルーシャ様が……。:
This is really bad. Lutiana... Lady Illusia
is...

261498.「一度 フィネトカへ退き\n 他の者どもにも しらせねばならん。\n わしは 先:
We must return to Finetka and let the others
know. I'll go on ahead.

261499.「極天女帝から 話は聞いた。\n とんでもない事態に なっちまったようだな？:
We heard from the Sky Empress. It seems we've
got quite a terrible situation on our hands,
huh?

261500.「ナラジアに ジャゴヌバの魂が\n 入っていたとはな……。\n そんなふうには:
I had no idea Narasia had Jagonuba's soul
inside him... it didn't seem that way at all.

261501.「それよりも 心配なのは イルーシャよ。\n ナラジアと共に 行ってしまったなん:
I'm more worried about Illusia. I can't
believe she went with Narasia...

261502.「ナラジア様は イルーシャ様と共に\n ルティアナ様によって 創られし双星……。:
Master Narasia and Lady Illusia were twins
created by Lutiana... I served them both many
years ago.

261503.「じゃが ナラジア様は 滅びの神の依代として\n 光の河の中に 封じられたはずな:
But Master Narasia was supposed to be sealed
in the River of Light as the vessel for the
God of Destruction. Why has he awakened?

261504.「考えている時間は なさそうじゃ。: There's no time to think about it.

261505.「いずれにせよ 女神様が 滅びの神と\n 共に行動するなど 見過ごすことはできぬ:
In any case, we cannot overlook the fact that
the Goddess is working with the God of
Destruction. We must go after Lady Illusia.

261506.「……そこには かの禁忌の邪神も\n 待ち受けていよう。戦いは 避けられん。:
The Dark Deity will be there waiting for you.
A battle is unavoidable.

261507.「じゃが ナラジア様は さらなる邪神の復活をも\n ほのめかしておった。わしら:
But Master Narasia also hinted at the revival
of the other Dark Deities. We, the Six Saints,
must prepare for that and stay behind.

261508.「ゆえに 神殺しの修行を終えた ユシュカと\n アンルシア……そして <pc>に:
As you both have completed your godslaying
training, I would ask that you rescue Lady
Illusia. <pc> will join you.

261509.「……頼まれなくても 行くつもりだったぜ。\n もう 誰ひとり 失わないと誓った:
...Like you have to even ask. I promised
myself that I wouldn't lose anyone else.
I WILL save Illusia.

261510.「邪なる者どもから 世界を救うことが\n 勇者としての……私の使命です。\n 当:
It is my mission as Hero to save the world
from evil. Naturally, I will be there, too!

261511.「よくぞ 言ってくれた。\n では 女神様たちが行くと 話しておった\n ルファ:
Well said. Allow me tell you about the Rufa
Temple that the Goddess mentioned.

261512.「神魂融合の儀が行われる地こそが ルファ神殿。\n アストルティアと 魔界の間に:
Rufa Temple is where the ritual to reunite the divine souls will take place. It is said to be built within the River of Light that separates
Astoltia and the Demon World.

261513.「広大な光の河の中にあって ルファ神殿の所在は\n 魔界と アストルティアをつな:
The temple is located in the part of the
River of Light near Luxgarn Caverns, which
connects the Demon World and Astoltia.

261514.「その大空洞なら 魔界へ行く時に通ったわ。\n ガミルゴの盾島から 行けるはずだ:
I went through that cavern on my way to the Demon World. I used the entrance where Gamilgo's Shield was, but I had no idea there
was such a temple...

261515.「魔界側は バルディスタ領 ザハディガル岩峰の\n 駐屯所にある大門から 入るこ:
The Demon World side can be accessed through a large gate in the garrison at the Zahagidal Pinnacle. I had no idea a temple like that
existed, either.

261516.「敵は……ナラジア ピュージュという道化師\n 復活したという 禁忌の邪神か。\:
Our enemies are Narasia, that clown Pyuju,
and the resurrected Dark Deity. That's quite
the lineup.

261517.「……俺に 少し 考えがある。\n すぐに 追いつくから\n 先に ルファ神殿に:
...I have an idea. I'll catch up with you
later, but you should go on ahead to Rufa
Temple.

261518.「では どちらからでもよい。\n まずは ルクスガルン大空洞を目指し\n ルファ:
First, you must enter Luxgarn Caverns and find
your way to Rufa Temple. You can enter from
either side. It's all up to you!

261519.「……すごい。ここが ルファ神殿。\n 光の河の中に こんな建物があっただなんて:
Amazing...so this is Rufa Temple.
To think such a structure existed within the
River of Light...

261520.「どうやら 間に合ったようだな。\n この大舞台に 遅刻したんじゃ しまらない。:
Guess I'm right on schedule. Wouldn't want to
be late for the big show.

261522.「イルーシャ！ 今 助けにいくぞ！: Illusia! I'm coming to save you!

261524.「ククククク……。\n ジャゴヌバ様のもとには 近づけさせぬ……。:
Keh heh heh heh... I will not let you near
Lord Jagonuba...

261525.「……これが 禁忌の邪神なのね。\n こうして 対峙しているだけで\n 強大なチ:
The Dark Deity of Forbiddance...
I can already feel his overwhelming power.

261526.「これまでだったら 少しは ビビってたかもな。\n だが……俺たちには 新しいチ:
Until now, I would've been a little scared.
But...we have a new power!

261528.「ハッ 見たか！\n これが 俺の新たなチカラだ！: Ha! You see that? That's my new power!

261529.「すごい！ 一撃で……: Amazing! With just a single strike...

261532.「……すまない。\n しかし ２体 いたとはな。:
...Sorry. I didn't know there were two of
them.

261535.「生き返った……？\n たしかに 討ち取ったはず……！:
He's revived...? I was certain you took him
down...!

261536.「ワレワレは ３つの身体で １つの魂。: We are three bodies, one soul.

261537.「３つが倒れぬ限り 何度でも よみがえる。:
As long as all three do not fall, we shall
keep reviving.

261538.「ジャゴヌバ様から オマエたちを\n 決して 近づけぬようにと 命じられた……。:
Lord Jagonuba has commanded me to keep you
away from Him...

261539.<center>これより先の侵入は 禁忌なり。\nククククク……。:
Any further intrusion... is forbidden.
Keh, heh, heh, heh...

261540.「ちくしょう 余計なことを……。\n これでは イルーシャに追いつけそうにないな:
Damn it, what a bother... we'll never catch up
to Illusia like this.

261541.「先に進むには ３つの塔に 分かれた邪神を\n ひと息に倒して 禁忌の邪神が張っ:
To proceed, we need to defeat the Dark Deities
in each of the three towers all at once, and
break the God of Forbiddance's wards.

261542.「けど そうするには\n ここにいる人数だけじゃ 難しそう……。:
But it'll be difficult to do with the numbers
we have here...

261543.「どうやら 俺の策が 実を結びそうだな。\n ……先に見える 塔に行かないか？\:
Looks like my plan is about to pay off. Why
don't we try heading to the tower ahead? I'll
tell you what we're going to do there.

261545.「やあ 大魔王。\n ずいぶん 苦しい状況なんだってね？:
Hello, Demon Lord. We heard you're in
quite the pickle.

261546.「じつはな…… ここへ来る前に\n 敵の頭数を 考慮して\n 援軍を 呼んでおい:
The truth is... before I came here, I called
for some backup given the enemy's head count.

261548.「助けにきましたよ！\n アストルティアの運命が かかっているとあらば\n 断れ:
We're here to help! If the fate of Astoltia is
at stake, I can't refuse. I'll do my best!

261549.「今こそ あなたに ご恩返しするとき。\n それに 世界全体の危機となれば……\:
Now is the time to return the favor. Besides,
when the whole world is at stake, that
includes Nadragand.

261550.「私が持てるチカラの すべてを\n あなたがたに お貸ししましょう。: I will lend you all the strength I have.

261551.「さて……ここに集まった 俺たちが\n この事態を なんとかするしかない。\n:
Well... now that we're all here, we're gonna
need a plan. Let's get the details sorted out.

261552.「ナラジア……その中にいる ジャゴヌバは\n この中央塔の上階へ イルーシャを連:
Narasia... that is, Jagonuba inside of him,
has taken Illusia to the top floor of the
central tower. That's where we need to go.

261553.「だが 禁忌の邪神が 神殿の上部に\n 結界を 張った。あの結界を破らねば\n:
But the Dark Deity of Forbiddance has placed a
ward on the upper level of the temple. If we
don't break that ward, we can't reach Illusia.

261554.「邪神は分身して ３体いるの。\n 特殊な能力を持っていて 全員同時に倒さないと:
The Dark Deity has three shadows. They have a special ability, and if you don't defeat them all at the same time, they'll come back to
life over and over.

261555.「そう……だから 奴らが 生き返る前に\n まとめて 倒す必要がある。\n そこ:
Yes... so we need to take them all out before
they can revive. So we'll split up.

261556.「ここに集まった人手を ３組に振りわける。\n 同じタイミングで 出発して\n:
We'll divide into three groups. We'll set out
at the same time, and take out the Dark Deity
at the top of each tower at the same time.

261557.「だが 邪神と戦うには\n ヤツらに対抗する 特別なチカラがいる。\n この中で:
But to fight the Dark Deities, you must have a
special power to resist them. And the only
ones here who have it...

261558.「対邪神のチカラ 神殺しの心気を習得している\n 私と ユシュカ……それから <:
There's Yushka and myself, who have the power
of godslaying...and then there's
<pc>. We three need to split up.

261559.「その通りだ。\n そして ここにいるのは ７人……。\n 分けると ３ ２ ２:
Right. And since there's seven of us... we'll
split into groups of three, two, and two.

261561.「僕が 君と行くよ……ユシュカ。\n お互いに よく わかっているからね。:
I'll go with you, Yushka. We know each other
well enough.

261562.「……そうだな アスバルと行こう。\n お前となら 最大のチカラが 発揮できそう:
...Right, I'll go with Asbal. With you around,
I'll be able to use my full strength.

261564.「魔王ヴァレリアと 一緒に行かせてもらいます。: I'll go with Demon King Valeria.

261565.「……フン いいだろう。\n 何のつもりか知らないが 受けてたつ。:
...Hmph, fine. I don't know what you're
thinking, but I'll accept.

261566.「では 私と エステラさんは\n <pc>さんと 一緒ですね！\n それならば:
Then Estella and I will go with
<pc>! In that case, we have
nothing to fear!

261567.「こうして肩を並べるのは 久しぶりですね。\n 共に ナドラガンドを旅した日々の:
It's been a long time since we stood shoulder
to shoulder like this. It reminds me of the
days when we traveled together in Nadragand...

261568.「……よし。これで 魔界と\n アストルティアの共同戦線が 成立したな。:
...Alright. With this, a united front between
the Demon World and Astoltia has been
established.

261569.「敵は 強大だ。\n だが…… 俺たちが協調し 助けあって\n 戦えば 必ず 勝:
The enemy is powerful. But... if we work
together, we stand a chance to win.

261570.「大魔王が 登りはじめたタイミングで\n 一斉に 出発しようじゃないか。\n 準:
We'll begin once the Demon Lord begins
their ascent. Head out once you're ready.

261571.「ククククク……。\n ワレの課す禁忌を 破ったな？:
Kukukukuku... So, you've broken past the seals
I placed before you, eh?

261572.「禁忌を破りし者には 死あるのみ……！:
For those who break my seals... death is the
only escape!

261573.「……感じたこともない 強大なチカラだ。: It's a mighty power I've never felt before.

261574.「おじけづいたか？ 不安なら 隠れていろ。\n 俺が 片付けといてやる。\n 修:
Getting cold feet? If you're worried, go and
take cover. I'll clean up for you. I'll show
you the results of my training!

261575.「見くびるなよ。\n あの頃の僕とは 違う。\n ……僕は 魔王なんだ。:
You underestimate me. I'm not the same as I
was back then. I'm a Demon King, after all.

261576.「フン…… 言うようになったじゃないか。\n さあ 行くぞ！: Heh... now you're talking. Let's go!

261577.「ククククク……！\n 苦悶と死を…… 与えよう……！:
Kukukukuku...! I bestow agony and death upon
you...!

261579.「こいつが 邪神……。: So this is a Dark Deity...

261580.「……相手にとって 不足はなさそうだ。: ...As an opponent, he is not lacking.

261581.「さあ 勇者……足手まといになってくれるなよ。: Now, Hero... try not to slow me down.

261583.「……みんなも 戦っているわ。\n 私たちも 行くわよ！: ...The others are fighting, too. So must we!

261586.「ですが…… 悪しき神と 相まみえるのは\n これが はじめてでは ありません。:
But this isn't the first time we've faced an
evil god. If we work together, we can win!

261587.「私が こんな戦いに 加わることに\n なるなんて……まったく あなたと一緒にい:
I never thought I'd be a part of such a
fight... I must say, I've been in some pretty
crazy situations with you.

261588.「……魔界の皆さんも 戦っています。\n さあ 行きましょう！:
...The people of the Demon World are fighting,
too. Come on, let's go!

261590.「ワレワレを……\n ３つ 同時に 倒すとは……。:
How... could you defeat all three of us at the
same time...?

261592.「こちらこそ。\n ひとりだったら きっと 勝てなかったわ。:
You, as well. If I were alone, I'm sure I
wouldn't have won.

261594.「だが……貴様は もっと 強くなれる。\n この先も 鍛錬を 怠るな。:
But... you can be stronger still. Don't
slacken in your training in the future.

261595.「ええ そうね。\n あなたに 情けない姿は 見せられないものね。:
Yes, you're right. I can't let you see me
looking so pathetic.

261596.「だからこそ…… この戦いも\n あなたと 一緒に戦うことを 選んだのよ。:
That's why... I chose to fight this battle
with you.

261598.「ジャゴヌバ様の命令は……\n 必ずや 果たす……！: I will fulfill... Lord Jagonuba's orders...!

261605.「すみません……。\n これでは もう 戦えそうにありませんね。:
I'm sorry... I don't think I can fight
anymore.

261608.「皆さん 無事みたいですね！\n しかし……先程の爆発で 装置が壊れてしまって\:
It looks like everyone is safe! But... those explosions destroyed the devices, and it seems that this tower is the only one that can get
to the center tower now!

261609.「<pc>っ！\n 俺たちのことには構わず 先へ進めっ！:
<pc>! Don't worry about us, just
keep going!

261610.「私は ここで エステラさんを治療します。\n どうか 先に進んでください！: I have to treat Estella. Please go on ahead!

261611.「イルーシャさんを……\n そして アストルティアと……魔界を\n 救ってくださ:
Save Illusia, and Astoltia... and the Demon
World!

261612.「あははは～ 待ってたよ 盟友くん。\n やっぱり 来たんだね。:
Ahahahaha! I've been waiting for you, ally. I
knew you'd come.

261613.「ヤファギルくんには 荷が重かったかな？\n まあ 目覚めたばかりだったし……\:
Were you too much for Yaphagil to handle?
Well, he had only just woken up... I'll give
him a break for such a shoddy performance.

261614.「でも……ここから先には 行かせないよ♪\n もう これ以上 ジャゴヌバ様の\n:
But... I won't let you go any further♪ I
can't let you get in the way of Lord Jagonuba
any longer♪

261615.「……あれれー？\n なつかしい お客さんが来たなあ！:
...Ooohh? Now there's a face I haven't seen in
a long time!

261616.「……まさか こんなところで\n アンタに 会えるなんてね。\n ピュージュ。: ...I never thought I'd find you here, Pyuju.

261617.「あはは マリーン！ キミと\n ジュリアンテの人形は まあまあ 役立ったよ！\:
Ahaha, Malynn! You and Juliante's dolls worked
just fine! I got tired of them, though, so I
threw them away♪

261618.「ピュージュとは 古い 知り合いでね。\n ちょっとした 因縁があるのさ。\n:
Pyuju and I go way back. We have a bit of a
history. But now it's time to settle that old
score.

261619.「コイツとは このまま戦っても キリがない。\n 突くべき急所を あぶり出すには:
As he is now, there will be no end to the fight. In order to uncover his weakness, we first need to expose his true form and beat
him to a pulp.

261620.「これは…… ラーの鏡！\n さあ 真の姿を見せな！ バケモノ！:
With this... the Mirror of Ra! Come on now,
show us your true colors, you damn monster!

261621.「……あはは。そんなことしちゃって 大丈夫？\n 本気のボクには かなわないと思:
...Ahaha. Are you sure you wanna do that? I
don't think you can handle the REAL me♪

261622.「そんなに見たいなら 見せてあげよう！:
But if you wanna see it so badly, I'll gladly
show it to you!

261624.「気をつけな。\n コイツは…… 嘲弄の邪神ピュージュ！:
Be careful. That thing is the Dark Deity of
Scorn, Pyuju!

261625.「５００年ほど前 けがれの谷にある\n 女神の祠の封印を破って\n ジャゴヌバ復:
About 500 years ago, he broke the seal of the Goddess' shrine in Defiled Valley, and has been working behind the scenes to revive
Jagonuba ever since.

261626.「……あたしは 結界を張って 援護する。\n 頼んだよ！:
...I'll cover you with my wards. I'm counting
on you!

261627.「邪神のボクと 正面きって 戦おうだなんて\n サイコーに 愉快で 愚かだね♪:
Fighting me, a Dark Deity, head-on, has got to
be the funniest, most stupidest thing I've
ever heard♪

261628.「さあ ボクを 楽しませておくれよ♪\n あはは！ あははははは！:
Come on then, try to keep me entertained♪
Ahaha! Ahahahaha!

261630.「邪神のボクが ヒトごときに\n やられちゃうとは……これは 笑えないね……。:
I, a Dark Deity, was beaten by a mere
mortal...? This... isn't funny...

261631.「フン……年貢の納め時だね。ピュージュ。: Hmph... time to pay the piper, Pyuju.

261633.「そろそろ カルサドラ火山と シエラ巡礼地に\n 眠っていた邪神が 復活する頃さ:
The Dark Deities that lay dormant in Calsadora
Volcano and the Sierra Shrinelands should

261634.「そしたら アストルティアは\n ジャゴヌバ様の覚醒を 待たずして 滅ぶんだ！:
Astoltia won't even have to wait for Lord
Jagonuba's revival to be destroyed!

261642.「や…やめろぉ！\n たかが ニンゲンごときが……！: S...stop! Not by a mere human...!

261643.「……アイツは 無数にいるように見えて\n 中核となる １体だけが 本体なのさ。:
...It may seem like there's an infinite number of him, but only one is the core body. Now that I've got him under wraps, we're good to
go.

261644.「ふう……この術を使うのは……\n さすがに こたえる。\n もう あたしも 若:
Phew... using that technique... took a lot out

261645.「なんだい……？\n ジャゴヌバは どうしたのかって？: What...? What about Jagonuba, you ask?

261646.「……奴は もう覚醒寸前だった。\n 封印を 維持できそうになかったから\n 仕:
He was on the verge of waking up. I wasn't
going to be able to maintain the seal, so I
had no choice but to leave and come here.

261647.「それよりも……\n イルーシャちゃんが 待ってるよ。\n はやく 行っておあげ:
But more importantly... Illusia is waiting for
you. Hurry up and get going.

261648.「やっぱり 来てくれたのね。\n あなたの光を ずっと感じてた……。:
I knew you'd come. I've been feeling your
light...

261649.「何も告げずに あなたのもとを\n 去ってしまって ごめんなさい。:
I'm sorry I left without explaining anything
to you.

261650.「……ルティアナ様を 復活させるには\n 私と ナラジアの ふたりで\n 神魂融:
In order to resurrect Lutiana, it was
necessary for both Narasia and I to perform
the ritual to reunite the divine souls.

261651.「だから 滅びの神の依代と知っていても\n ナラジアと一緒に 行くしかなかった。:
So I had no choice but to go with Narasia,
even though I knew he was the vessel for the
God of Destruction.

261652.「<pc> ありがとう。\n 最後に 会えて うれしかった。:
Thank you, <pc>. I'm glad I was able
to see you one last time.

261654.「光あるところに 必ず 闇はある。:
Where there is light, there is always
darkness.

261655.「でも 闇があるところに\n 必ずしも 光はあるだろうか？:
But where there is darkness, is there
necessarily light?

261656.「ううん。闇は……\n それだけで 在ることができるんだ。\n 光なんて いらな:
No. Darkness... can exist on its own. It does
not need the light.

261657.「……ねえ <pc>。\n 僕は キミたちに 感謝しているんだ。:
...Hey, <pc>. I'm really grateful
to you guys.

261658.「ジャゴヌバが 完全に チカラを取り戻すには\n 女神の いばらの封印が 邪魔だ:
The seal of the Goddess' thorns was the only
thing preventing Jagonuba from regaining his
full strength.

261659.「でも キミたちが\n そのいばらを ほどいてくれたんだよ。: But now you guys untied those thorns.

261660.「何を 言っているのか わからない？\n ふふふ……じゃあ 教えてあげるよ。:
Don't know what I'm talking about? Hmhmhm...
then let me explain it to you.

261661.「女神が ジャゴヌバを封印したのは\n 知ってるだろ？ あれはね……自分と相手を:
Do you know how the Goddess sealed Jagonuba?
It was a powerful curse that seals both its
target and the user alike.

261662.「そして たった今 女神の封印が解けた。\n そのとき もう片方のジャゴヌバの封:

261663.「もう わかっただろう？\n キミたちは 光の女神だけでなく\n 滅びの神をも:
Now do you get it? You not only brought back

261664.「ご苦労だったね！\n 特に キミの働きは 見事だったよ！\n アハハハハ！:
Well done! You, especially! You performed
brilliantly! Ahahahaha!

261665.「……イルーシャも このことは 知っていたよ。\n それでも 愛する世界を 守れ:
Illusia knew this, too. And still, she chose

261666.「ルティアナが 勝てるかどうかなんて\n わからないのにね！:
Without knowing if Lutiana could even win this

261667.「さあ 舞台は ととのった。\n この神々の戦いで 世界の命運が決まる。\n …:
Now the stage is set. The fate of the world
will be decided by this battle between gods...
I will show you firsthand!

261668.「さあ……目覚めよ！\n 滅びの神 ジャゴヌバ！: Now... awaken! Jagonuba, God of Destruction!

261669.「僕と ひとつになって……\n すべてを 滅ぼすがいい！:
Become one with me... and let us destroy
EVERYTHING!!

261672.「女神様が 復活されたということは\n イルーシャは……。それなのに……。:
If the Goddess came back, then that means

261673.「もはや 滅びの神を\n 止める手立ては なくなった。:
There is no longer any way to stop the God of
Destruction.

261674.「では……\n 世界は 滅んでしまうのですか……？: So... the world will be destroyed?

261676.「……急ぎ 魔界に戻るぞ。\n 魔界は 我らが守る。:
Let's hurry back to the Demon World. We must

261677.「魔界と アストルティア。\n ふたつの世界が チカラを合わせても\n ジャゴヌ:
The Demon World and Astoltia... even when both
worlds joined forces, are they still no match
for Jagonuba...?

266463.「ルティアナといえど ジャゴヌバを封印するには\n それしか 方法がなかったんだ:
Even Lutiana had no other choice but to seal
away Jagonuba... even if it meant sacrificing
Herself.

268976.「かの箱に 納められしは 女神の衣……！: In that box is the robe of the Goddess...!

272995.<pc>は 光を放つ装置によって\nルファ神殿の中央塔へと 転送された！:
<pc> was transported by the
light-emitting device to the center tower of
Rufa Temple!
